properties.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County; Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 4:49AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
A of snow will extended from around Jackpot to Austin and was
moving southeast fairly rapidly early Thursday morning. This band
was producing mostly light snow, with a few pockets of moderate
snow and poor visibility. Summits and other exposed roadways will
be affected until the band moves out. Conditions will improve
by late morning. As always, for road conditions check nvroads dot
com.


Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

NWSheadline: A band of light to moderate snow will move southeast out of Nevada by late morning
